bibl.title: E. BLOXAM and J.A. HARRELL, New Evidence of Small-scale Roman Basalt Quarrying in Egypt: Widan el-Faras in the Northern Faiyum Desert and Tilal Sawda by el-Minya. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Basalt sources, mineralogy and texture. - The use of basalt in ancient Egypt. - The Widan el-Faras basalt quarry. - The Tilal Sawda basalt quarry [near El-Bahnasa, formerly the site of the Graeco-Roman city of Oxyrhynchus]. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003

bibl.seg: STOREMYR P., T. HELDAL, E. BLOXAM and J.A. HARRELL, New Evidence of Small-scale Roman Basalt Quarrying in Egypt: Widan el-Faras in the Northern Faiyum Desert and Tilal Sawda by el-Minya. Avec résumé en anglais.

Yannis MANIATIS (Éd.), ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003 = BCH. Supplément 51 (Athènes, 2009) pp. 243-256, 13 figg.

Introduction. - Basalt sources, mineralogy and texture. - The use of basalt in ancient Egypt. - The Widan el-Faras basalt quarry. - The Tilal Sawda basalt quarry [near El-Bahnasa, formerly the site of the Graeco-Roman city of Oxyrhynchus]. - Conclusions.
